name: UpdateWorkplaceType
description:
Update the workplace type for a specific location.

Use this tool to modify the workplace type of a given location within an organization. This operation requires the `organizationWrite` permission.

parameters.name: location_workplace_update_info
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the location ID and the new workplace type to be set. Example: {"locationId": "12345", "workplaceType": "remote"}.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
